title: Location Services Issues
content: Maps does not have an issue with finding my location, however, when I am using apps like Endomondo or Strava, both have difficulty connecting with the GPS signal. I did not have any issues with these apps when I had a Samsung Galaxy S8, but now am having issues with my 3 XL. I have tried troubleshooting (i.e. uninstalling and reinstalling, checking permissions etc.) but haven't had any luck.
